name: leagues_v2_list
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool livescore_v2.
Tool description: This API helps to query for football, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey matches, leagues, news, etc... to create a sporting site/application such as livescore.com
API description: List all leagues by category (football, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey)
* Base for Img field is https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium . Ex : https://lsm-static-prod.livescore.com/medium/enet/9906.png

category.description: Category of the sport. One of the following: soccer, cricket, basketball, tennis, hockey.
